code: @Test public void testXsltOutput() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedBodiesReceived("<goodbye>world!</goodbye>").     mock.message(0).body().isInstanceOf(Document.class).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "<hello>world!</hello>").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("xslt:org/apache/camel/component/xslt/example.xsl?output=dom").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
